thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Norway Telecoms regulator plans new regulation of broadband markets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Norway Telecoms regulator plans new regulation of broadband markets
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Telenor Asa:
* NORWAY TELECOMS REGULATOR: PLANS NEW REGULATION OF BROADBAND MARKETS
* NORWAY TELECOMS REGULATOR: NEW REGULATION TO PREPARE GROUND FOR UPGRADE OF TELENORâ€˜S COPPER NETWORK; ALLOW MORE FIRMS TO OFFER SIGNIFICANTLY HIGHER BROADBAND SPEED
* NORWAY TELECOMS REGULATOR: TELENOR MUST STILL PROVIDE ACCESS TO ITS COPPER AND FIBER ACCESS NETWORKS ON NON-DISCRIMINATORY TERMS Source text (in Norwegian):
here %C3%A5ndsmarkedene Further company coverage: (Reporting By Ole Petter Skonnord)
